front.title: RSVP-TE extensions for dynamic hostname traversing OSPF routing areas

abstract.t: RFC 5642 defines an OSPF Router Information TLV that allows OSPFRouters to flood their hostname-to-Router-ID mapping information.Sometimes, when the operators create an inter-area MPLS LSP tunnelwith Resource ReSerVation Protocol-Traffic Engineering (RSVP-TE),they need the hostname display on the CLI at the ingress node formanagement and operational reasons. This document describesextensions to RSVP-TE to support hostname-to-Router-ID mappinginformation traversing areas in an inter-area MPLS LSP tunnelsituation.
